errors.error_description: Used conda install instead of pip install when the package is only available on PyPI
Specified Python 2.7 as requirement when modern packages require Python 3.x
correction_candidates: Note: DaCy requires Python 3.8 or higher for optimal performance.
Note: DaCy requires Python 3.6+ for optimal performance.
Note: DaCy requires Python 3.7 or later for optimal performance.
Note: DaCy supports Python 3.9+ for optimal performance.
errors.golden_answer: Note: DaCy requires Python 3.8 or higher for optimal performance.
